WEATHER FORECAST FOR 08 January 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 07 January 2024
Showers will occur at times in Eastern, Northern and Uva provinces. Several spells of showers will
occur in North-central province. Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in other
areas of the island after 1.00 p.m.

eavy showers about 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
